dataList.name: The Last Resort
dataList.desc: Turn End: If all allies except for this unit are immobilized due to external effects, equip 'A.B.S Max Attunement 【Degraded Corrosion】' next turn
dataList.flavor: 'I knew it... Everyone...'

dataList.name: Fireproof
dataList.desc:
Damage from [Combustion] cannot Stagger this unit and does not reduce this unit's HP below 1; this unit cannot be immobilized due to external effects

Take -50% damage from [Combustion]

dataList.name: E.G.O Attunement Boost
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: Gain [LvUpFireFly]

On Hit: At less than 70% HP, apply 1 [Combustion] to target and self

dataList.name: E.G.O Resonance Boost
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 1 [AttackUp] for every ally wearing E.G.O gear

dataList.name: Like a Moth to a Flame
dataList.desc:
This unit prioritizes attacking enemies with the lowest max HP

Heal 10 SP when killing enemies with [Combustion] damage or Attack Skills that apply [Combustion] (max once per turn)

dataList.name: Fate Lost
dataList.desc: Lose this Encounter if this unit is killed after Hohenheim is killed
dataList.flavor: One may get lost and wander onto the wrong path, but willful defiance or deviation from the flow are forbidden by "it."

dataList.name: Can't Underestimate the HQ's E.G.O Attunement and its Corrosion
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: Gain [LvUpHohenheimBigBird]

dataList.name: E.G.O Gear Proficiency Manual
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every ally wearing E.G.O gear
dataList.flavor: Written by Hohenheim.

dataList.name: Don't Blindly Follow the Light when Lost in the Black Forest
dataList.desc: Turn Start: If this unit does not have [LanternHohenheimBigBird], gain 1 [LanternHohenheimBigBird] Turn End: At 20 [LanternHohenheimBigBird], inflict [DelusionHohenheimBigBird] to the enemy that uses its powerful attack next turn

dataList.name: Dazzling Lamp
dataList.desc:
This unit prioritizes attacking the enemy with the fastest Max Speed

When chaining Skills, this unit can draw enemies' attack toward self regardless of Speed (Focused Encounters only)

dataList.name: Its Eyes Have Watched Over the Entire Black Forest
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Apply ([Binding] on self /2) [Agility] to the ally (excluding this unit) with the slowest Speed next turn (max 2, rounded down)

If this unit has the slowest Speed, deal +10% damage with Base Attack Skills
- If this unit's Speed is 1, deal +20% damage instead

dataList.name: Fate Lost
dataList.desc: Lose this Encounter if this unit is killed after Alyssa is killed
dataList.flavor: One may get lost and wander onto the wrong path, but willful defiance or deviation from the flow are forbidden by "it."

dataList.name: The Yellow Harpoon (named by: Ezra)
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: Gain [YellowHarpoon]

Turn Start: If this unit has 0+ SP and The Middle Nursefather has 2 [ReinforcedTattooSpider], gain [YellowHarpoonSin]

At less than 0 SP, lose [YellowHarpoonSin]
dataList.flavor: "Okay, hear me out. Hear me out, Baby bee! You're good with harpoons, right? You use a super snazzy special harpoon, right? And you're shootin' for the Yellow Color, right? Bam! There ya have it! The Yellow Harpoon!!!"

dataList.name: The Wasp of the Distortion Detective Office
dataList.desc: In the turn Moses equips 'Inhale Deep the Red Breath', this unit gains [YellowHarpoonSin] permanently

dataList.name: Fate Lost
dataList.desc: Lose this Encounter if this unit is killed
dataList.flavor: One may get lost and wander onto the wrong path, but willful defiance or deviation from the flow are forbidden by "it."

dataList.name: Panic Recovery - Deep Contemplation
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: Gain [MosesWarPTSD]

Turn End: If this unit is in Panic, reset SP to 0

dataList.name: Crimson Point
dataList.desc: If the Middle Nursefather has Lævateinn, this unit gains [MosesSin] and uses 'Inhale Deep the Red Breath' every turn If this unit has [MosesRedBreathCharge], becomes immune to Panic Turn End: At 3 [MosesRedBreathCharge], use a powerful Skill
dataList.flavor: Concentrate into a single point all that constitutes the physical force and stack the layers into a cylindrical pillar—then expel it toward another single point.

dataList.name: Fate Lost
dataList.desc: Lose this Encounter if this unit is killed
dataList.flavor: One may get lost and wander onto the wrong path, but willful defiance or deviation from the flow are forbidden by "it."

dataList.name: Dimensional Bag [Ezra]
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: Gain 1 [DimensionalBagEzraA]

If this unit used the current Workshop weapon more than once, switch weapons the next turn

List of weapons:
- Allas Workshop Gloves
- Nester Workshop Hammer
- Screw Atelier Drill Hammer
- Namir Workshop Gauntlets

dataList.name: Detecti—I mean, Team Leader! We've Got Your Back!
dataList.desc:
This unit's weapon rotation is fixed to 'YuRia Atelier Special Handmade Golden Retriever-Exclusive Axe' starting from the turn Moses equips 'Inhale Deep the Red Breath'

This unit gains [MiddleFingerEzraSin] starting from the turn Moses equips 'Inhale Deep the Red Breath'
dataList.flavor: "Remember that case in that hotel with the Bloodfiend? Man, that was sick."

dataList.name: Fate Lost
dataList.desc: Lose this Encounter if this unit is killed
dataList.flavor: One may get lost and wander onto the wrong path, but willful defiance or deviation from the flow are forbidden by "it."

dataList.name: The Red Gaze
dataList.desc: Turn End: Inflict 3 [Binding] next turn against enemies with 50% or more HP Enemies that are about to use Attack Skills against this unit gain 1 [Reduction]

dataList.name: White-hot Gladius
dataList.desc: Inflict 1 [AaCfPcBiv2] On Hit with a Gladius Skill

dataList.name: Bloody Tears
dataList.desc:
On Skill Use: Take 3% of max HP as fixed damage (this damage cannot kill this unit).
On Hit with a Skill: Heal 10% of HP damage dealt

dataList.name: Blood Barrier
dataList.desc: Every turn, all allies, including this unit, gains Shield HP

dataList.name: Shin (心) - The Red Gaze
dataList.desc: When 'The Thumb Nursefather - Valencina' has [ObsessionAndGreed], this unit gains [VergiliusSin] next turn

dataList.name: Effloresced E.G.O::Lavacrum Sanguinis
dataList.desc:
Enter Effloresced[TabExplain] E.G.O::Lavacrum Sanguinis state, and gain the following effects:
- Gain 3 Haste every turn
- Become immune to [Laceration] damage
- Unlocks E.G.O Manifestation Skills

dataList.name: Fate Lost
dataList.desc: Lose this Encounter if this unit is killed
dataList.flavor: One may get lost and wander onto the wrong path, but willful defiance or deviation from the flow are forbidden by "it."

dataList.name: The Guide
dataList.desc: Observes Dante's command and adjusts his Skills' targets accordingly
dataList.flavor: 'Following the flow...'

dataList.name: Dismantle Prosthesis
dataList.desc:
Deal +40% damage to <Mechanical Amalgam> and <Distortion>

On Kill, all other allies heal 20 SP (once per turn)
dataList.flavor: The Second Smoke War was a conflict between humans and humans who no longer looked the part.

dataList.name: Shin (心) - A Certain Sinclair
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain [WillAwakenSinclair] (once per Encounter)

dataList.name: Withstand the Smoke
dataList.desc:
This unit does not take SP damage due to external effects and cannot become immobilized

If an ally becomes immobilized due to external effects before Turn End, use 'Abate the Smoke[TabExplain]'
dataList.flavor:
The Smoke of the Second War was no different in nature from that of the First—it invaded the mind and clouded the judgement of the victim.
Survival was reserved only for those who learned to accept the Smoke as part of their daily lives.

dataList.name: Lend My Ear to the Inner Self, Hold onto the Representation of its Voice...
dataList.desc:
Gain [SignAwakenSinclair] and [LimitedAwakenSinclair] when an enemy with 1,000+ max HP is killed (once per Encounter)
- Afterward, convert all Coins into [SuperCoin]s when this unit uses Pride, Wrath, Envy Skills

dataList.name: Special Airborne Operations Force - Abraxas Chariot
dataList.desc: Targets with less than 20 [Burst] do not lose [Burst] Count when this unit hits them with Skills that inflict [Burst] Potency or Count
dataList.flavor:
Guerrilla warfare played an important role during the Second Smoke War.
The most feared among the undertakers of these ambushes were none other than the airborne forces that descended directly upon the combat zone and turned the tide of the battle unexpectedly.
These airborne soldiers would appear out of nowhere by utilizing technologies such as Singularities of the Wings—they would carry out their mission immediately, and once their objectives were accomplished, they would disappear without a trace.
"The Abraxas Chariot" was one of the groups that inspired the most dread in the War alongside those airborne forces such as "Descenders of 101 Doors" and "The Dimension Roamers."

dataList.name: Halberd and Bastard Sword
dataList.desc:
After Attack: Remove 1 beneficial effect from target and inflict 4 [Burst] (once per turn)

Turn End: Remove 1 negative effect from self and gain 5 [Breath] and +2 [Breath] Count
dataList.flavor:
Wielding a nameless halberd and a bastard sword, the young man, clad in a dull green coat, would ravage through the enemy lines before vanishing without a trace once he was done.
Some called him the Green Damnation, while others called him the Green Deliverance.

dataList.name: Sign - Manifestation of the Future
dataList.desc:
All allies, including this unit, gain 1 more E.G.O resource when using Skills

Turn End: Heal 6 SP for every other Sinner present in the Encounter

dataList.name: Fate Lost
dataList.desc: Lose this Encounter if this unit is killed
dataList.flavor: One may get lost and wander onto the wrong path, but willful defiance or deviation from the flow are forbidden by "it."

dataList.name: Shin (心) - The Red Gaze
dataList.desc: Encounter Start: Gain [VergiliusSin]

dataList.name: Wading Through a Dream, the Self Nowhere to be Found [無我夢中]
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: Gain [CutbondRyoshu] equal to current turn count
Gain 1 [CutbondRyoshu] for every use of this unit's Coin
dataList.flavor:
'I must make it look as though Araya is already safely out of the House of Spiders.'

'I'll stage it by raising this blade against the Nursefathers—that should sell the story that I am trying to stop them from going after Araya.'

dataList.name: Like the Naraka of Avīci and Raurava [阿鼻叫喚]
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: Gain [HeavenlyKillerStar] and fix SP at -44

When taking SP damage including effects caused by Sinking, take (SP damage x 3) HP damage instead
dataList.flavor: 'I know better than anyone how strong and tenacious the Nursefathers are.' 'If I am to deceive them, I'll need to stage a desperate act with everything at my disposal.' 'Plan how I'll take on each of them—how their swords will clash with mine.' 'I may lose control over my own mind, but I will make sure to run the picture through my head over and over.'

dataList.name: Severed and Torn until Even the Form is Undone [支離滅裂]
dataList.desc:
On Hit, inflict 1 [CutoffRyoshu]
- Turn Start: Inflict 1 more [CutoffRyoshu] for every 10 [CutbondRyoshu] on self (max 4)

When hit, take -([CutbondRyoshu] on self + [CutoffRyoshu] on target)% damage (max 90%)

If there is an enemy that has 100 [CutoffRyoshu] after this unit finishes all attacks with its Skills, use a powerful Skill on target
dataList.flavor:
'I'm not strong enough to kill the Nursefathers—this I know. But I can still incapacitate and hold them back, if only for a little while.'

'And then...'

'And then, I'll leave...'

'I'll leave and come back stronger.'

'Secure the help of someone stronger than me, or gain more allies... Either way, I must come back with a guaranteed means of dealing with them once and for all.'
